name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Senior QA Engineer, I bring 8+ years of expertise in software engineering, combined with a strong proficiency in **manual testing**, **UI testing**, **regression testing**, and **cross-browser testing**. I have demonstrated success in Agile environments utilizing **Jira** to enhance project management and communication. My technical acumen includes knowledge of **Python** for automation testing, as well as familiarity with **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **Selenium** for comprehensive test coverage across various platforms, notably iOS and Android. Additionally, I possess advanced analytical skills and attention to detail, ensuring high-quality deliverables in alignment with the **SDLC** and **STLC** methodologies. My ability to collaborate effectively within teams, coupled with a robust understanding of market needs, enables me to provide efficient testing solutions that uphold the highest standards of performance while embracing cutting-edge technologies.

experience.responsibilities:
- Led manual and automated testing strategies within an Agile framework using **Jira** to ensure adherence to the **SDLC** and **STLC** in the development of cloud-native Python applications.
- Conducted regression testing and cross-browser testing to validate user interfaces across web and mobile platforms, employing tools like **Selenium**, **Cypress**, and **Playwright** to enhance reliability.
- Developed comprehensive test cases and test plans that focused on detailed **UI testing** for applications supporting **iOS** and **Android**, ensuring top-notch quality of the healthcare platform.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to engage in iterative feedback cycles, ensuring effective **communication** and addressing defect analysis in a timely manner.
- Enhanced testing frameworks using **TypeScript** in conjunction with existing Python applications, increasing efficiency in UI testing and cross-platform compatibility.
- Utilized analytical skills to dissect complex workflows and improve testing coverage, managing over **10+ projects** simultaneously under tight deadlines.
- Championed quality assurance best practices, embedding comprehensive test strategies throughout the product lifecycle to meet compliance standards, including **HIPAA** and **GDPR**.
- Trained and mentored junior QA engineers on the use of testing frameworks and Agile methodologies, promoting a culture of continuous improvement and attention to detail across the team.
- Reported on testing metrics with a **30%** reduction in defect rates and improved testing accuracy under rapidly changing development requirements.
- Participated in the evaluation and integration of advanced testing tools to streamline processes, achieving a **40%** increase in testing automation coverage using innovative practices.

• Conducted thorough **manual testing** and **UI testing** for applications developed with **Python** to ensure high-quality deliverables by implementing **Agile** methodologies and leveraging tools such as **Jira** for issue tracking and project management.
• Executed **regression testing** and **cross-platform testing** to validate core functionalities across different environments like **iOS** and **Android**, ensuring compatibility and user satisfaction.
• Developed comprehensive test cases for APIs built with **Python**, leveraging frameworks like **Selenium** and **Cypress** to automate browser testing, achieving an efficiency increase of **30%** in the testing workflow.
• Demonstrated strong **analytical skills** through detailed analysis of system specifications and effective **attention to detail** in identifying defects, leading to a **25%** reduction in post-production issues.
• Collaborated with development teams in adopting **SDLC** and **STLC** best practices to streamline the testing process, resulting in quicker time-to-market for software releases by **15%**.
• Utilized **Playwright** for automated cross-browser testing, ensuring consistent user experience across various platforms while significantly reducing testing cycles.
• Implemented continuous integration pipelines using **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions** to facilitate automated testing and code review processes, enhancing product delivery agility.
• Engaged in effective **communication** among cross-functional teams to align on project requirements and resolve issues in real-time, contributing to an improved workflow and project outcome.
• Actively contributed to sprint planning and retrospective meetings within the **Agile** framework, enabling continuous improvement and team collaboration throughout the development lifecycle.

Performed comprehensive **manual testing** to ensure product quality and reliability, including **UI testing**, **regression testing**, and **cross-browser testing** to support multiple platforms including **iOS** and **Android**.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment using **Jira** to track progress, manage tasks, and enhance communication among team members, resulting in a **20%** increase in project delivery speed.
Conducted detailed **STLC** and **SDLC** activities, documenting test cases, test plans, and ensuring adherence to quality standards throughout the software development lifecycle.
Executed end-to-end testing processes using **Selenium** and **Cypress** for UI-level validation of web applications, achieving a defect leakage rate of less than **2%** post-release.
Utilized **TypeScript** alongside **Python** for test automation, enhancing test coverage and efficiency in various stages of the development process.
Adopted and implemented **Playwright** for cross-platform testing, ensuring consistent functionality and performance across browsers and devices.
Analyzed testing results and communicated findings effectively to development teams, fostering a culture of continuous improvement based on **analytical skills** and **attention to detail**.
Created automated test scripts for application functionality with a focus on user experience, utilizing the latest technologies to streamline processes and reduce manual effort by **30%**.
Participated in thorough testing of payment integrations, ensuring secure transaction processing compliant with industry standards, achieving **100%** successful test scenarios.
Supported the implementation of CI/CD pipelines, facilitating continuous integration and delivery which significantly improved overall project efficiency.
Conducted rigorous cross-platform validation, ensuring applications function seamlessly across diverse environments to enhance user satisfaction and performance metrics.
